name: ATT_PROV_SEC_ID
description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record.  The ATT_PROV_SEC_ID table holds secondary (legacy) identifiers for the attending provider.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: ATT_PROV_SEC_QUAL
columns.description: This item holds a qualifier describing additional IDs used to identify the attending provider.

columns.name: ATT_PROV_SEC_ID
columns.description: This item holds additional IDs for the attending provider.

columns.name: ATT_PROV_SEC_QUAL_OID
columns.description: The ID for the list of possible attending provider ID types.
